results.title: Simvastatin mitigates functional and structural impairment of lung and right ventricle in a rat model of cigarette smoke-induced COPD.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ mitigates functional and structural impairment of @DISEASE_Lung_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung@@@ and right @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Ventricle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002551 @@@ventricle@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of cigarette smoke-induced @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang Y, Jiang X, Zhang L, Wang L, Li Z, Sun W. Simvastatin mitigates functional and structural impairment of lung and right ventricle in a rat model of cigarette smoke-induced COPD. Int J Clin Exp Pathol. 2014;7(12):8553-62. PMID: 25674219

results.title: Soy milk versus simvastatin for preventing atherosclerosis and left ventricle remodeling in LDL receptor knockout mice
results.text_hl: In this study, we compared the effects of oral treatment with soy milk and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@, left @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Ventricle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002551 @@@ventricle@@@ remodeling and @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerotic lesion@@@ of @GENE_LDLR @GENE_16835 @@@LDL receptor@@@ knockout @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ (@GENE_LDLR @GENE_16835 @@@LDLr@@@-/-) fed a hyperlipidic diet.

citations.NLM: Santos L, Davel AP, Almeida TI, Almeida MR, Soares EA, Fernandes GJ, Magalhães SF, Barauna VG, Garcia JA. Soy milk versus simvastatin for preventing atherosclerosis and left ventricle remodeling in LDL receptor knockout mice Braz J Med Biol Res. 2017 Feb 20;50(3):e5854. PMID: 28225891
